text: "You Always Know the DJ" is a song by Australian rapper Allday. It was released in September 2014 as the second single from the Allday's debut studio album Startup Cult. The singles was certified gold in Australia in 2018. ==Track listing== Digital download # "You Always Know the DJ" (MD remix) – 3:38 # "You Always Know the DJ" – 3:50 ==Certifications== ==References== Category:Allday songs Category:2014 songs Category:2014 singles
title: You Always Know the DJ
